export default function DashBoard( {rollRoom, setRollRoom, setDiceInput, setMapModal, setRoomNumber, roomInput, diceInput, hideDice, showDice} ) { let backgroundColor = 'green' if (rollRoom === 'On') { backgroundColor = 'green' } else { backgroundColor = 'red' } return (
setDiceInput(e.target.value)} >
Room #
setRoomNumber(e.target.value)} value={roomInput} />
Roll Room:
) }
